metadata.title: CVE-2022-0843 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developers Kershaw Chang, Ryan VanderMeulen, and Randell Jesupreported memory safety bugs present in Firefox 97. Some of these bugsshowed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effortsome of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 98.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
